Local Government (Number of Councillors) Order 2014

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under sections 214E(1)(m) and 25(4) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

3 February 2014

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Local Government

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government (Number of Councillors) Order 2014 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
        (1) The Acts Interpretation Act 1931 applies to the interpretation of this order as if it were by-laws.
        (2) A word or expression used in this order and in the Local Government Act 1993 has the meaning it has in that Act.

PART 2 - Number of Councillors

4. Number of councillors for Derwent Valley municipal area
    The total number of persons to be elected as councillors of the municipal area of Derwent Valley is 8 on and after the day on which the certificate of election is issued in respect of the next ordinary election of councillors for that municipal area that is held after this order takes effect.

5. Number of councillors for Southern Midlands municipal area
    The total number of persons to be elected as councillors in the municipal area of Southern Midlands is 7 on and after the day on which the certificate of election is issued in respect of the next ordinary election of councillors for that municipal area that is held after this order takes effect.

6. Number of councillors for Waratah-Wynyard municipal area
    The total number of persons to be elected as councillors in the municipal area of Waratah-Wynyard is 8 on and after the day on which the certificate of election is issued in respect of the next ordinary election of councillors for that municipal area that is held after this order takes effect.

PART 3 - Amendment of Local Government Act 1993

7.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 12 February 2014

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
